Package org.codehaus.groovy.tools

Compiler entry points and miscellaneous development tools.

          Description

Class Summary
Compiler A convenience front end for getting standard compilations done.
DgmConverter  
ErrorReporter Provides services for reporting compilation errors to the user.
FileSystemCompiler Command-line compiler (aka.
GroovyClass  
GroovyStarter Helper class to help classworlds to load classes.
LoaderConfiguration Class used to configure a RootLoader from a stream or by using it's methods.
RootLoader This ClassLoader should be used as root of class loaders.
StringHelper  
Utilities Various utility functions for use in the compiler.
